extendedInfo.description: >>>Customize the Lock Screen you like, Launch the actions you needâ¦quickly!Note: ~~Price in ***India*** is having 50% off from 23/8/13 to 24/8/13 due to a student requested.~~If you are upgrading to the PRO VERSION , please DISABLE or UNINSTALL the FREE one. else you will be running 2 LOCKERs at the same time.~~If you are having any issue after update, please email me(i check daily) instead giving low rating.~~Email: cheahchinseng@gmail.com~~If you like this app, there is a Pro Version for you to upgrade to enjoy the full features.~~Although without disabling the system lock screen, this app will still work. But it's highly recommended to disable the system lock screen to get full performance of this app. just go Setting>Lock Screen>set lock screen type to NONE.~~Version 2.3.0+ Update will LOCK DOWN some of the FEATURE SETTINGS, DO NOT UPDATE THIS if you wish to keep these options OR you can buy the C Locker Pro Version to support my development and continue to enjoy all the features.=====Extra Features for Pro version: =====1. Things you can see from the Lock Screen:---RSS Feeds (CNN, BBC), Network Provider Name, Battery info..---Calendar Events List Reminder..2. Things you can customize on the Lock Screen---Volume Rocker Control, long press to play/skip (next/prev) music.---Screen Off Volume Skip (next/prev) music---Locker screen sliding gesture actions with 4 directions (Up, Down, Left, Right)---More than 10 custom shortcuts your can set to launch apps, direct call, direct sms---RSS update interval and other settings---PIN Unlock ---Clock background (Full transparent/Black transparent)---Clock position set to left/center---Font Styles, Font Colors=====Features for Free version: =====1. Things you can see from the Lock Screen:---Time, Date, Day, Next Alarm---Weather Information---Media buttons (previous, play, pause, next), this automatically shows if you have a song playing..---Missed calls, New SMS notice2. Things you can customize on the Lock Screen---Full Screen (hide the status bar...)---Lock screen Wallpaper (Live wallpaper now supported)---To show/hide missed calls contact, new sms contents---Own custom icon selection---Screen timeout---Unlock sound, screen off sound---Disabling Default Home Button function, Long press Home Button to launch recent apps---Weather update interval and other settings---And many other customizations=====Thanks to=====XDA User: Mr.Johan for the French translation: "https://plus.google.com/u/0/114730485950304866750/posts"Tassos,Cyprus for the Greek Translation "https://plus.google.com/117228957741576157151/posts"Mr.TK Bay for the Youtube Review: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQN7NhtBqADmNaRA3yc_mAQ?feature=watchChange Logs:2.5v+-added: option to disable system settings when in lock screen -fixed: screen timeout handling, sometimes reset to 3 second-added: device administrators option for full security password control (pro)-added: Swedish, Germen Translation, thanks to XDA members: b0red, BratHuhn-updated: the Locker will be the 1st to show up when rebooting if you have set "disable home button"-fixed: custom rss update link changed to "cnn" when selected and other minor bugs2.4v+-fixed: weather icon error for sunrise/sunset time-added: option to have "Easy Drag"-fixed: unlock sound not working2.3v+-added: yahoo weather "location region/state" in weather view-added: MMS notice support-added: custom rss url (Pro)-added: option to select weather c/f, kmh/mph separately-added: option to select music icons-updated: Weather day/night Icon auto update based on YahooWeather Sunrise/Sunset-disabled: proximity sensor that not compatible with some of the devices-added: Live Wallpaper is now supported-added: options to set Wallpaper dimming level in "Display Settings"

reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
reviews.comment: Love it.  Fantastic.  Does everything I need it to.  It\'s the ONLY app that has met and satisfied my requirements.  Looking out for more apps/widgets from maker.
reviews.author: Janis Taylor

reviews.title: Best Lock screen replacement i\'ve found
reviews.comment: Pretty much the best lock screen app I\'ve tried, barely have any lag issues, full of features, even the free version has just enough options to do what I want. Also the developer was quick to email me on a issue, that turned out to be me no the app, great service and great app, brought the pro version!
reviews.author: cameron charles

reviews.title: Hi! Help :)
reviews.comment: Just found this lockscreen and seems to be what i was looking for. Just one question. Why everytime i unlock the screen it takes me right to the settings of the app? Please help me on this issue. Thanks in advance. Cheers, Bela
reviews.author: Bela Balla

reviews.comment: Fantastic.!
reviews.author: CHONG MING CHUNG

reviews.title: Notificatin icon
reviews.comment: After the recent update the notification shows up all the time for the active notice. Anyway to get rid of it?  Other than that it\'s great app!  -----  Unchecked the option and it works great again. It\'s great APP as I comment already!
reviews.author: Rick An

reviews.title: Difficult to unlock sometimes
reviews.comment: So uninstalling.
reviews.author: Doug Finlay

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice locker but wish I could change time format but you need to buy pro version for that. Except for that its nice.
reviews.author: Steve Eby

reviews.title: Awesome potential
reviews.comment: This could easily be the best locker. Tried the pro version but refunded it only because every time I opened up an app it said \"app not supported\". Fix that and I will keep the pro version next time.
reviews.author: Mikael Bystedt

reviews.title: It was a keeper...
reviews.comment: Until I found that I had to pay to get the time changed from military to standard. Just silly IMHO. Best of luck to the dev, cuz the app has promise.
reviews.author: Todd Moser

reviews.title: Its good but..
reviews.comment: Unable to change clock from military time. Also I have set it to Fahrenheit with the temperature and it reverts back to Celsius. Other than that great app.
reviews.author: tee p

reviews.title: Very good but lacks polish
reviews.comment: The app is not visually polished. And the most annoying thing is that if you swipe in the direction of an app but instead of stopping at the app icon you go a bit further in that direction so it won\'t unlock or launch that app. I mean it should recognise the directional gesture regardless of weather you stop at app icon or not.  And second thing many times quick unlocking and locking causes direct entry without it showing up.
reviews.author: Puneet Dembla

reviews.comment: Nice app bro!
reviews.author: Rajesh Kumar

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: great features.. but SMS notification doesn\'t work on my screen..
reviews.author: Abhay Rana

reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: Rahman Mahmoodi

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Just one question and maybe I didn\'t see it but can I change the temperature from C to F
reviews.author: James Azzarella

reviews.title: galaxy grand duos
reviews.comment: everything working good and i like it.... but while this lock screen is active my proxymity sensor is not working properly...during the call the screen is not turning off . when i disable this app its working fine. please solve this problem
reviews.author: sai krishna

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: totally customizable and most of the important features are free 1star is cut coz theres some prob with media player shortcut \'coz it automatically changes to its default setting Also it wil b more nice to use it if the looks of the lock is a lil professional or may be it has options to choose between the screens But neways till now the best lock screen i came across
reviews.author: Mamta Kanvinde

reviews.title: Just  few questions.
reviews.comment: I can\'t find your email, but is there a way to change the time format from military to standard?  Also, when I unlock the phone it will sometimes show the C Locker app instead of the home screen.  Any fix for these?   Other than that, awesome app!
reviews.author: Nic Giordano

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I works pretty well, but sometimes the lock screen doesn\'t show up after I push the home button when the screen is locked.
reviews.author: Damian Burgess

reviews.title: Well...
reviews.comment: Msg notifications dont work properly. Can\'t swipe anywhere to unlock; needs to be specifically from one icon to an unlock icon. Music player controls don\'t work. Gave a star because the calender function was nice
reviews.author: adam rodriguez
